mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, E.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT x.ex_no, u.nick, x.ex_content,x.ex_date, x.file_no XX , u.file_no UU, FX.file_no FFXX, FU.file_no FFUU, FX.origin_name AS PIC, FX.stored_name AS PICTURE, FU.origin_name AS PRO, FU.stored_name AS PROFILE, (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_ex_comm WHERE ex_post_no = x.ex_no) AS comm , (SELECT count(*) FROM tb_ex_like WHERE ex_post_no = x.ex_no) AS heart FROM tb_extagram x LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user u ON x.user_no = u.user_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file FX ON x.file_no = FX.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file FU ON u.file_no = FU.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_comm c ON x.ex_no = c.ex_post_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ex_like l ON x.ex_no = l.ex_post_no ORDER BY x.ex_no DESC ) E ) tb_extagram WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, E.* FROM ( SELECT x.user_no, x.ex_no, f.stored_name, f.origin_name FROM tb_extagram x LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON x.file_no = f.file_no WHERE user_no = #{USER_NO} ORDER BY ex_no DESC ) E )tb_extagram WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
